episodes.title: 083 - There's No Rock and Roll on Mars
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Is the Big Bang really a thing? Does the driver or the passenger get to pick the music? What if someone gets pregnant on Mars? And more!

Email us: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 082 - Where There Was Previously Nothing
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How long until everyone is related to Beyoncé? When does parenting stop sucking? How can I help the world without being rich? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 081 - Always Making Progress Forever
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Can you separate the artist from the work? How do bugs survive microwaves? Will we ever be a perfectly unified planet? And more!

Sarah's cookies! https://digitalcookie.girlscouts.org/scout/sarah755035

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 080 - Life Is Hard and Also Has Good Things
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
What are the top ten kinds of spoons? Why do boys kiss like dying fish? What would happen if we lost gravity for fifteen seconds? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 079 - Tiny Useless Pelvises (That Are Still There)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How nice do you have to be at the grocery store? How do we know humans didn't come from Mars? What is sound even? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 078 - Being Sure
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How do I stop catfishing someone? How do I not feel embarrassed sharing my writing? Should I DIY my shirt? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 077 - Save Us, Giant Octopus
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should you always imagine people complexly? Would constellations be different on Mars? How many trees would you have to plant to offset your carbon footprint? And more!

episodes.title: 076 - The Best of Dear Hank & John
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
A look back on some of the most memorable moments in the history of the pod! Featuring: Jurassic Mars, Ryan, OH MY GOD IT'S BURNING, John's atrocious cereal eating habits, pumpkins and penguins, the long con, and more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 075 - The Nutrient Coconut Milk of Sin (w/ Katherine Green!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Who does my cat think I am? Is listening to music a waste of time? Should we get a new coconut? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 074 - The Kindness Muscle
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How do I deal with finals stress? What building would you haunt? How do I teach my kid not to bully? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/
Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 073 - Planes, Trains, and Automosqueals
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
What do you do if you're lost in the forest? Is Santa subject to trademark laws? Should I take a boring job for money? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/

Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 072 - Planet Dirt (Hank Returns!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Is Die Hard a Christmas movie? Should I tell my mom about my risky plans? What is the tipping point for apocalypse chaos? And more!

NerdCon: Nerdfighteria: http://www.nerdconnerdfighteria.com/

Email your questions: hankandjohn@gmail.com

episodes.title: 071 - Only Pause for Applause (w/ Hannah Hart!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Help, I can't tell my roommates apart! What if my relationship has an expiry date? How much reflection should you do after finishing a book? And more!

episodes.title: 070 - The Rhythmic Thud of the Space Bar (w/ Ashley Ford!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do we move forward post-Election Day? How do you know when/if to have kids? Why does the space bar sound like that? And more!

episodes.title: 069 - Live from NerdCon: Stories (w/ Karen Hallion!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Who is the foxiest founding father? How do I convince my boyfriend to not go to Mars? Is all my sister's stuff mine now? And more!

episodes.title: 068 - Gaga in Space (w/ Tyler Oakley!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Are quesadillas sandwiches? What is the ideal OK Cupid match percentage? How much of another person's food am I allowed to consume? And more!

episodes.title: 067 - Feeling Home
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should I ghost out of my job? Are bubble baths a hobby or an interest? How do I not feel like a forever foreigner? And more!

episodes.title: 066 - A Great Bit of Oratory
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I keep enjoying music I enjoyed with an ex? How do I recover from being doused in bull semen? What are my responsibilities when people ask me to watch their stuff? And more!

episodes.title: 065 - But... You're a Horse
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should we fear a locust apocalypse? Will listening to Japanese while I sleep help me remember it? How do I remain confident in my art around older, more experienced artists? And more!

episodes.title: 064 - Really Terrible Scandinavian Geography Lessons
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why won't people accept my tissues? Should half-wolf children be vaccinated? What do I do when I see a stranger crying in public? And more!

episodes.title: 063 - World Queen
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: What do I do while people are singing "Happy Birthday"? What are mushrooms even? Is it okay to want people to not be wrong? And more!

episodes.title: 062 - Pumpkins and Penguins (and Fiddles)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I go about my secret fiddle long con? Why do almost all zippers have the letters YKK on them? Do bugs ever have a destination in mind when they walk around aimlessly? And more!

episodes.title: 061 - Tiny Acts of Kindness
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do gas planets work? What is proper door etiquette? Is Hank going to put the lime in the coconut and drink it all together? And more!

episodes.title: 060 - There is Almost Always a Future
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Where all all the dead birds? Should I really live each day of my life like it's my last? Am I a fraud for being a social chameleon? And more!

episodes.title: 059 - Hank's Disaster Preparedness Plan
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: What is my actual favorite color? At what point in the day do I switch to "have a good night" as my go-to courtesy? What do I do when The Big One hits? And more!

episodes.title: 058 - That's the Science (w/ Flula!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why are there holes in crackers? What is proper hot tub etiquette? Can I snapchat politicians about immigration reform? And more!

episodes.title: 057 - Og Nomekop
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I organize someone else's books? How do I justify the money allocated to extending my life? How does tug of war work? And more!

episodes.title: 056 - Is It Going to Throw Up?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I dad? Are expiration dates just suggestions? What do I call the people I work with? Do I really need to get drunk on my twenty-first birthday? And more!

episodes.title: 055 - A Proper Dumpster Fire
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should I sell cold, fresh potty water? Why don't we write phonetically? Why do I like all this sad stuff? And more!

episodes.title: 054 - Nerd Punk
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Are bell peppers airtight? How do I quit smoking? Why is that new baby smell so good? And more!

episodes.title: 053 - The Worst Episode Ever
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Do fish swim? Is Hank snapchatting? How do I stop my earphones from getting tangled? How do I deal with a job that I hate? And more!

episodes.title: 052 - We are in this together.
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Will my laptop sterilize me? Do you like (or write) fanfiction? Where is the rest of the lizard whose tail I found in my room? And more!

episodes.title: 051 - Weird/Bad Dancefighting
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: What are nerdfighters fighting? How do I learn to enjoy physical activity? How do I stop talking about Mars in my sleep? And more!

episodes.title: 050 - Things Are Like Other Things
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why isn't John on Hank's Top 8 on MySpace? What is the correct way to eat an Oreo? Is my can opener a sign that I've entered an alternate universe? And more!

episodes.title: 049 - Not Not An Adult (w/ Sydney Green!)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do you define adulthood? Is it slice of pizza or piece of pizza? How do I reclaim my armrest when I'm in the middle seat? And more!

episodes.title: 048 - Pizza John Priorities
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Is Pizza John inherently unsexy? Should I court familial disaster? Where else can I seek dubious advice? And more!

AFC update tag music is 'News Sting' by Kevin MacLeod. http://incompetech.com

episodes.title: 047 - You're Gonna Be Okay
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I mourn a mug? What if it had been Vlogsisters instead of Vlogbrothers? How do I navigate roommatedom? And more!

episodes.title: 046 - Brotherhood 3.0
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Where are all the Bob Ross paintings? Why is a minor injury more painful to me than literal childbirth? How do I get myself a surprise party? And more!

episodes.title: 045 - Not Knowing
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should I feel guilty about liking Hamilton? Why aren't we talking about our impending death by Yellowstone? Should I be saving all my burrito money for the economic apocalypse? And more!

episodes.title: 044 - A Life Sandwich
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I find joy when my main source of it has been taken away? How do I deal with my unfortunate name, which is not Ryan? How do I handle compliments? How do I deal with over-the-top laughter? How do I deal with the closest thing there is to death? And more!

episodes.title: 043 - Gotta Be Kitten
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why do people put up with banana opportunity cost? How do I deal with bird attacks? Chemtrails: what's up with them? And more!

episodes.title: 042 - Mayonnaise Malaise
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Am I making unethical sandwich decisions? Am I a sucker for not cheating in school? Do we need drive-thru reform? Why do farts smell worse in the shower? And more!

episodes.title: 041 - In the Absence of Toes
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Have we checked in on the bees? What would happen if you lost your big toe? How do you stir hot cocoa efficiently? And more!

episodes.title: 040 - Almost Distressingly Good Advice
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How Canadian am I, really? How should I unpack? How do I reconcile my ideals with my actions? And more!

episodes.title: 039 - Feelings are Alright (With Katherine Green)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do I overcome pizza betrayal? What's the deal with sesame seeds? How do I solve my sibling ball crisis? What do I do in Montana? How do I deal with my driving anxiety? And more!

episodes.title: 038 - The Smelling in Your Dwelling
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why don't bugs die when we flick them? Why do we talk the way we do? What's the deal with dollars in movies? How much would it cost to buy the world a coke? And more!

episodes.title: 037 - The Floridiest Place
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do you reattach John's head? Why aren't supreme court justices chosen more efficiently? How do you hug? Does Mars have seasons? Why don't people eat grass like cows?

episodes.title: 036 - Grief is Super Weird
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Is there a secret planet opposite ours? Is strawberry flavor fooling us all? How can we be better listeners? Why do people ghost other people?

episodes.title: 035 - Should I Get Baptized if I Don't Believe?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Am I Lisa Turtle or Screech? What would happen to lava on the sun? After blowing ones nose, why does one look into the Kleenex? Coconuts are hairy an make milk, are they mammals? When does the early 2000s become "The Turn of the Century"? AND OTHER QUESTIONS ANSWERED!

episodes.title: 034 - YouTube Freaky Friday
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Can I eat expired Mac N Cheese? What would you do if you only had 300 subscribers on YouTube? Is a kitty on my lap an excuse for tardiness? What if you dumped the sun into a massive MASSIVE bucket of water? What do you do when someone asks you a question that you aren't ready to answer?

episodes.title: 033 - Putting Water in Cereal?!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why do we fall for clickbait? Why do smells become normal? Why do we call aluminum foil "tin foil?" Why do people always ask where I'm from? My name is boring! Are four-sided bananas safe to eat?! THESE AND OTHER QUESTIONS, ANSWERED FOR YOU TODAY!

episodes.title: 032 - Broccoli Flavored Chocolate
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Can create fresh water by boiling the sea with a giant magnifying glass? Is suffering necessary for us to appreciate the beauty in life? What about asteroids and super-volcanos! Should a heart be judged by how much it loves or by how much it's loved?

episodes.title: 031 - Breakin' the Law (and Being Good.)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should I give up on my dreams of changing the world? Is mayonnaise an instrument? Why are DVD cases not squares? Can you burn a cucumber? Does the moon have Earth eclipses? Do you have anonymous social profiles?

episodes.title: 030 - Ending the Hiaaeetus!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: What do you do when your couple friends stop hanging with single you? Should we imagine evil people complexly? Could you light Saturn on fire? How long could humans survive only eating humans? And then we discuss our over/unders for age of death.

episodes.title: 029 - Barbershop Genghis
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Do you need to be a Patreon supporter to get your question answered? How do I make my partner comfortable at his first Christmas with my family? Why are mini-M&Ms better than the regular kind? Why do we always assume life needs water? And an important update from Sweden!

episodes.title: 028 - John's Top Ten Probable Apocalypse List
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Why are there no feral cows? What are you looking at? Should you say "Bless You" when someone coughs? What would happen if the magnetic poles reversed? How do I keep my nerves from getting the best of me (while playing competitive Pokemon)? What can we do to make the conversation around religion less awful? And more questions answered here at Dear Hank and John! 

And YES the new Wimbledon stadium at Plough Lane has been approved!!

Edited by Nick Jenkins. Music by Gunnarolla.

episodes.title: 027 - Giving Gifts Without Breaking the Bank
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Did we discover the periodic table, or did we invent it? How do you start running a business with friends? How would one go about crashing the moon into the Earth? Is an emoji a word? And finally, most importantly, when is it ok to start listening to Holiday music?

episodes.title: 026 - Should I Make Out With My Roommate?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How do I choose an ethical engagement ring? There's a wasp trapped in my dorm room! How do I know which arm rest is mine at the movie theater? And a question about grammar...from our father.

Also, we have a patreon now: https://www.patreon.com/dearhankandjohn

episodes.title: 025 - LIVE IN NEW YORK it's NARS MEWS!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why are we so obsessed with zombies? What do you do if your dentist tries to talk to you when you obviously can't talk? How do beat my girlfriend's gift skills? Should I try to re-kindle a friendship with someone who I did something nasty to? AND OTHER QUESTIONS answered here, today, on Dear Hank and John.

episodes.title: 024 - The Great Finger Licking Debate
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do you learn new things as an adult? Oral surgery advice? Worrying about hexagons and etc!

episodes.title: 023 - OH MY GOD IT'S BURNING
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Why do different trees change color at different times? What if a friend isn't creating their creative work that you love? Some advice for job and scholarship interviews. How do I express empathy properly? How should I feel about getting worse at Tetris?

episodes.title: 022 - Post-Menopausal Cousin Marriage
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How should toilet paper be dispensed? Help! My fingers are glued together! If you hover a helicopter in the same place for 24 hours, why don't you travel around the earth? What food weird combinations do you like? What should I do if a scholarship requires me to read Ayn Rand? AND OTHER QUESTIONS ANSWERED!

episodes.title: 021 - Who Am I?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Halloween costume advice. Does John think people are evil? Misunderstanding Risk. Advice for referees of kids soccer games. Would the Bat Signal actually work? How does the stock market work? And, of course, a very brief discussion of the self.

episodes.title: 020 - This Episode Contains Puke
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should I cave to my parents and have them at my wedding? Are we just cats? Why does 98 degrees feel hot if that's my body temperature? How do I read slow books? What do you do when your loved one is in a pyramid scheme?

episodes.title: 019 - Should I Abandon My Stuffed Animal?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Should I watch YouTube ads? How do I make friends with my old neighbors? What do I do when my daughter won't sleep because she's always on the internet? When is it worth arguing on the internet? Will climate change mess with forecasts?

episodes.title: 018 - Coming to Terms with your Nerdiness
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How do I balance my marriage with my career? What if your job isn't morally ambiguous? Is there something wrong with me if I am informed but also not sure who to vote for?

But boy do we spend a lot of time on that first one because we clearly think about it a lot! Also...WATER ON MARS!

episodes.title: 017 - Meeting Taylor Swift('s parents)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How do I stop projecting onto people? What do you do when you get pigeonholed as "the smart kid"? Is English class valuable? And of course...do you have any advice for new drivers...of course we do...be very careful and do not kill us.

NOTE: This was recorded before the big Mars news that was released today but, oddly enough, I talk about the thing that the news is about which is a bit confusing. Sorry about that.

episodes.title: 016 - Handling Awful Roomates
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Hey! Let's talk about Patrick Rothfuss's beard! Also, talking with Nathalie, falling asleep instead of singing, and how to run a press junket. It's a pretty weird and varied episode of Dear Hank and John! A comedy podcast about death.

episodes.title: 015 - Get That In Your Mouth!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: What is art? Should we lower the drinking age? What kind of liquor is the best? Who should I play with on Mario Kart? How do decrease my impact on the environment without money? What do you do when "The One" leaves you? And OTHER QUESTIONS ANSWERED!!

episodes.title: 014 - Jurassic Mars
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Do other people exist? How do I become a good middle school teacher? How do I know if I'm being egotistical? What is "home" and will I ever find it? And a secret that Hank has never told anyone and is totally ashamed of!

episodes.title: 013 - John and Hank and Wheezy Waiter!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
How do you make friends? What's your favorite planet? What would happen if you fell into Jupiter? Is it all downhill from 30? What sports did you play? If you could be a prodigy at any one thing what would it be?

Edited by Nicholas Jenkins.Theme music by Gunnarolla.

episodes.title: 012 - Tree Climbing Strategies
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary:
Do old people love minions? Do you believe in the multi-verse? What languages would you Matrix into your brain? How do you pick a sports team? What do fish dream about? These and other questions answered in this delightful episode of Dear Hank and John. 

Edited by Nicholas Jenkins. Theme music from Gunnarolla.

episodes.title: 011 - How do you "Make Something of Yourself"?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: If you could punch anyone in the face, who would it be? Do you need to "protect your image"? Do adults continue to change as they get older? What are some cheap date ideas? If you could invent a new word, what would it be? These and other questions (and also the news from both Mars and AFC Wimbledon) are contained within!

episodes.title: 010 - When Your Friend Likes Ayn Rand...
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Dear Hank and John now with 100% MORE JOHN! Here we discuss what to do when a young relationship is endangered by different goals, whether memory implants would be awesome or awful, and how to pick books and TV shows in a world of infinite content.

episodes.title: 009 - Dear Hank and Felicia
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Can you ruin your life in high school? How do you un-friend someone IRL? What video game world would you live in? Hank Green and Guest-John Felicia Day take on these questions and more in the final episode before John's return next week!

episodes.title: 008 - Dear Hank and Grace!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do you adjust to a new culture in a new town? Do I have to study at an Ivy League school? Should I keep chasing my dream? Grace and Hank have all the answers!

episodes.title: 007 - What to do About Stomach Farts
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: How do you avoid being pretentious when you're intelligent, Charlie and Jimmy's school uniforms, when to look for a new job, and all the news from both Mars and AFC Wimbledon.

episodes.title: 006 - Would You Eat a Moon Sandwich? (With Emma Blackery)
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Hank is joined by Emma Blackery (youtube.com/emmablackery) to give you some dubious advice about gherkins, Google Plus, fate and being short.

episodes.title: 005 - Should I Lie to Get a Job? With Maureen Johnson
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: With John out of town on the Paper Towns press tour, Hank calls on long-time John-replacement Maureen Johnson to help co-host this extra long edition of Dear Hank and John. In it, we discuss the science of sight, whether it's OK to lie to get a job, and how to deal with that paralyzing feeling that your life isn't special and that you're just going to do all of the same boring crap everyone else has already done.

episodes.title: 004 - What's in a Name?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: Will a nickname change who I am? Are the bees OK? Should I go to a fancy college? And is it OK if you don't feel as sad as you think you should?

episodes.title: 003 - Pain Demands to be Felt.
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: In which Hank and John discuss pain, the Istari, eschatology, and the slowness of apocalypses. Thank you to all of the many people sending in questions to hankandjohn@gmail.com.

episodes.title: 002 - It's a Humor Podcast!
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: In which Hank and John answer questions about global development, chronic pain, and being depressed in hotel rooms. It's a humor podcast!!

episodes.title: The Debut: Do You Pee on Your Own Head?
episodes.author: Hank Green and John Green
episodes.summary: John and Hank get together for the very first time to answer to answer a bunch of questions. Will we go to Ava's wedding? What college major will help the world most? Have you ever peed on your own head? Will humans eventually colonize the galaxy? What's going on with Mars? Also...AFC Wimbledon?!
